response.overview: A young half-Navajo convict dying of cancer forces a yuppie doctor to drive him to a magic healing lake.
response.tagline: It began as a kidnapping. It became a journey of hope.
response.title: The Sunchaser

titles.title: Sunchaser - Die Suche nach dem heiligen Berg
